data.name: fizzbuzz interview question
data.description:
The game fizzbuzz was founded in the UK. A group of individuals would gather in a circle and count until a member of the group screwed up. There is a catch, all numbers divisible by 3 would be replaced with the word 'fizz' and all numbers divisible by 5 would be replaced with 'buzz'. Any numbers divisible by both 3 and 5 would be replaced with 'fizzbuzz'.

Create a function that takes a single parameter (int) and returns the appropriate string for the number in the sequence. (Hint: function must always return a STRING!)

For Example:
fizzBuzz(1)  # Your function should return...
'1'
fizzBuzz(3)  # Your function should return...
'fizz'
fizzBuzz(5)  # Your function should return...
'buzz'
fizzBuzz(15)  # Your function should return...
'fizzbuzz'
